name: Mean Squirrel
description:
Play as Ratatoskr (pronounced: Ra-ta-tosk-urhh), the gossip-y messenger of Yggdrasil, as you deliver insults to the Eagle at the top (Overworld) and Nidhogg at the bottom (Underworld) of the tree.

Only your dextrous Squirrel movement and schadenfreude can accomplish this 'noble' task.

Run, jump, and climb the walls in search of the components of a sizzling insult, before delivering it personally to one of the big fellas.

How to play:

- WASD to move Ratatoskr, the Squirrel

- Spacebar to jump - do it again in the air for a double jump!

- FOLLOW THE ARROW! Run into word orbs and approach the Eagle or Nidhogg to deliver the insult when it's done

- Don't skip the Intro the first time - it contains important game-winning knowledge! You'll need it... even you, ItsDair.

Have fun!

DOWNLOAD LINK
https://we.tl/t-6Rjk9Gns28

Developers:
- LaurJam: Audio, Programming
- Busser: Programming, Post-processing, VFX
- Soondun: Programming, Level Design
- SoBigMuscles: Art
- Jotenonsos: Writing, Art, Voice Acting
